functionSubtypingOfVarArgs.ts(5,30): error TS2345: Argument of type '(...args: any[]) => void' is not assignable to parameter of type 'undefined'.


==== functionSubtypingOfVarArgs.ts (1 errors) ====
    class EventBase {
        private _listeners = [];
    
        add(listener: (...args: any[]) => void): void {
            this._listeners.push(listener);
                                 ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2345: Argument of type '(...args: any[]) => void' is not assignable to parameter of type 'undefined'.
        }
    }
    
    class StringEvent extends EventBase { // should work
        add(listener: (items: string) => void ) { // valid, items is subtype of args
            super.add(listener);
        }
    }
